nodes.bodyText:
NOTE: This is not actually needed for the fix.
However, after the the changes in this PR this filename property is no longer used in the templates. And this is not reliable anyway in the case of inline models. So I just did this cleanup rather than accumulating it as tech debt.
Apparently, this might break some setups that use externally-provided templates (via --template-dir).
I'm not sure what the policy is for such changes - is it safe to push to master? Should there be any changelog covering that? Or is it ok because codegen does not consider such custom properties a part of a public contract?
Open to suggestions here!
I suggest to leave it there, and remove it later for a major release
I'll restore these shortly and add a comment saying it's not used any more
